placeholderImages.description: A beautiful, warm illustration of a comfortable armchair next to a window, with a stack of books and a cup of coffee.
A clean, top-down view of a minimalist wooden desk with a laptop, a notebook, and a small plant.
A soft, ambient blend of pastel colors creating a calming and minimal backdrop.
A vibrant and modern university campus library.

A warm, cozy, aesthetic background illustration featuring a stack of vintage books, scattered papers, soft lighting, and floating autumn leaves. Use a brown and beige color palette with gentle gradients. Add subtle hand-drawn textures, warm shadows, and a calm scholarly vibe. Include small fun elements like a steaming coffee cup, glasses on the books, and tiny sparkles or falling feathers to add a magical, playful feel. The background should be soft, minimal at the top, and visually rich near the bottom so app icons can be placed clearly.

A soft, minimalistic, aesthetic study-desk background with a blurred depth-of-field effect. Include subtle elements like a pair of glasses, a warm latte art coffee cup, faint notebooks, and gentle shadows. Use cool grey and soft beige tones with a smooth gradient. The objects should be lightly out-of-focus to avoid distracting the UI content. The overall mood should feel calm, modern, and professional — perfect for a productivity app welcome screen.

A warm, cozy, playful digital illustration of a study desk from a top-view perspective. Include elements like an open spiral calendar planner, a notebook with pens and sticky notes, a cup of coffee with steam, round glasses, pens, leaves, small decorative plants, and soft organic patterns in the background. Use a warm beige base color with earthy tones like terracotta, olive green, and muted orange. All objects should have soft shadows and a friendly, hand-drawn aesthetic. The overall style should be clean, minimal, and playful — perfect as an app background without distracting the content.
